name: Final Project (YCMElSTER)
description:
This is an ARPG game that I have been thinking about for a long time. When I really started to make it from scratch, I found that many ideas could not be realized due to technical reasons. I will continue to learn and exchange ideas with others. I am confident that I can make an excellent ARPG game.

It is also recommended to play with a controller to achieve the best experience, thanks for playing!
